table.name: v_acquirablefile
table.viewSql: SELECT a.id AS acquirable_id, a.name AS acquirable_name, a.slug AS acquirable_slug, f.id, f.datetime, f.file, f.create_date, f.process_date FROM (acquirablefile f LEFT JOIN acquirable a ON ((a.id = f.acquirable_id)));

table.name: v_area_5070
table.viewSql: SELECT area.id, area.slug, area.name, st_snaptogrid(st_transform(area.geometry, '+proj=aea +lat_0=23 +lon_0=-96 +lat_1=29.5 +lat_2=45.5 +x_0=0 +y_0=0 +datum=NAD83 +units=us-ft +no_defs'::text, 5070), (1)::double precision) AS geometry FROM area;

table.name: v_download
table.viewSql: SELECT d.id, d.datetime_start, d.datetime_end, d.progress, d.file, d.processing_start, d.processing_end, d.status_id, d.watershed_id, d.sub, w.slug AS watershed_slug, w.name AS watershed_name, s.name AS status, dp.product_id, f.abbreviation AS format FROM ((((download d JOIN download_format f ON ((f.id = d.download_format_id))) JOIN download_status s ON ((d.status_id = s.id))) JOIN watershed w ON ((w.id = d.watershed_id))) JOIN ( SELECT array_agg(download_product.product_id) AS product_id, download_product.download_id FROM download_product GROUP BY download_product.download_id) dp ON ((d.id = dp.download_id))) ORDER BY d.processing_start DESC;

table.name: v_download_request
table.viewSql: WITH download_products AS ( SELECT dp.download_id, dp.product_id, d.datetime_start, d.datetime_end FROM (download d JOIN download_product dp ON ((dp.download_id = d.id))) ) SELECT dss.download_id, dss.product_id, dss.datetime_start, dss.datetime_end, dss.key, dss.bucket, dss.dss_datatype, dss.dss_cpart, CASE WHEN ((dss.dss_datatype = 'INST-VAL'::text) AND (date_part('hour'::text, dss.datetime_dss_dpart) = (0)::double precision) AND (date_part('minute'::text, dss.datetime_dss_dpart) = (0)::double precision)) THEN to_char((dss.datetime_dss_dpart - '1 day'::interval), 'DDMONYYYY:24MI'::text) ELSE COALESCE(to_char(dss.datetime_dss_dpart, 'DDMONYYYY:HH24MI'::text), ''::text) END AS dss_dpart, CASE WHEN ((date_part('hour'::text, dss.datetime_dss_epart) = (0)::double precision) AND (date_part('minute'::text, dss.datetime_dss_dpart) = (0)::double precision)) THEN to_char((dss.datetime_dss_epart - '1 day'::interval), 'DDMONYYYY:24MI'::text) ELSE COALESCE(to_char(dss.datetime_dss_epart, 'DDMONYYYY:HH24MI'::text), ''::text) END AS dss_epart, dss.dss_fpart, dss.dss_unit, dss.forecast_version FROM ( SELECT dp.download_id, dp.product_id, dp.datetime_start, dp.datetime_end, f.file AS key, ( SELECT config.config_value FROM config WHERE ((config.config_name)::text = 'write_to_bucket'::text)) AS bucket, CASE WHEN (p.temporal_duration = 0) THEN 'INST-VAL'::text WHEN ((a.name)::text = ANY ((ARRAY['AIRTEMP-MIN'::character varying, 'AIRTEMP-MAX'::character varying])::text[])) THEN 'PER-AVER'::text ELSE 'PER-CUM'::text END AS dss_datatype, CASE WHEN (p.temporal_duration = 0) THEN f.datetime ELSE (f.datetime - ((p.temporal_duration)::double precision * '00:00:01'::interval)) END AS datetime_dss_dpart, CASE WHEN (p.temporal_duration = 0) THEN NULL::timestamp with time zone ELSE f.datetime END AS datetime_dss_epart, p.dss_fpart, u.name AS dss_unit, a.name AS dss_cpart, f.version AS forecast_version FROM ((((productfile f JOIN download_products dp ON ((dp.product_id = f.product_id))) JOIN product p ON ((f.product_id = p.id))) JOIN unit u ON ((p.unit_id = u.id))) JOIN parameter a ON ((a.id = p.parameter_id))) WHERE (((date_part('year'::text, f.version) = '1111'::double precision) AND (f.datetime >= dp.datetime_start) AND (f.datetime <= dp.datetime_end)) OR ((dp.datetime_end < now()) AND (date_part('year'::text, f.version) <> '1111'::double precision) AND ((f.version >= (dp.datetime_end - '24:00:00'::interval)) AND (f.version <= dp.datetime_end))) OR ((dp.datetime_end >= now()) AND (date_part('year'::text, f.version) <> '1111'::double precision) AND ((f.version >= (now() - '18:00:00'::interval)) AND (f.version <= now())))) ORDER BY f.product_id, f.version, f.datetime) dss;

table.name: v_product
table.viewSql: WITH tags_by_product AS ( SELECT product_tags.product_id, array_agg(product_tags.tag_id) AS tags FROM product_tags GROUP BY product_tags.product_id ) SELECT a.id, a.slug, concat(upper((s.slug)::text), ' ', CASE WHEN (length((a.label)::text) > 1) THEN concat(a.label, ' ') ELSE ''::text END, p.name, ' ', ((a.temporal_resolution / 60) / 60), 'hr') AS name, a.label, a.temporal_resolution, a.temporal_duration, a.dss_fpart, a.description, a.suite_id, s.name AS suite, COALESCE(t.tags, '{}'::uuid[]) AS tags, p.id AS parameter_id, p.name AS parameter, u.id AS unit_id, u.name AS unit, pf.after, pf.before, COALESCE(pf.productfile_count, (0)::bigint) AS productfile_count, pf.last_forecast_version FROM (((((product a JOIN unit u ON ((u.id = a.unit_id))) JOIN parameter p ON ((p.id = a.parameter_id))) JOIN suite s ON ((s.id = a.suite_id))) LEFT JOIN tags_by_product t ON ((t.product_id = a.id))) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT productfile.product_id, count(productfile.id) AS productfile_count, min(productfile.datetime) AS after, max(productfile.datetime) AS before, NULLIF(max(productfile.version), '1111-11-11 11:11:11.11+00'::timestamp with time zone) AS last_forecast_version FROM productfile GROUP BY productfile.product_id) pf ON ((pf.product_id = a.id))) WHERE (NOT a.deleted) ORDER BY (concat(upper((s.slug)::text), ' ', CASE WHEN (length((a.label)::text) > 1) THEN concat(a.label, ' ') ELSE ''::text END, p.name, ' ', ((a.temporal_resolution / 60) / 60), 'hr'));

table.name: v_product_status
table.viewSql: WITH pf_date AS ( SELECT pf.product_id, max(pf.datetime) AS max_date FROM productfile pf WHERE (date_part('year'::text, (pf.version)::date) = '1111'::double precision) GROUP BY pf.product_id UNION SELECT pf.product_id, max(pf.version) AS max_date FROM productfile pf WHERE (date_part('year'::text, (pf.version)::date) <> '1111'::double precision) GROUP BY pf.product_id ) SELECT p.slug, md.max_date AS latest_product_datetime, p.acceptable_timedelta, date_trunc('minute'::text, (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - md.max_date)) AS actual_timedelta, CASE WHEN ((p.acceptable_timedelta IS NOT NULL) AND (md.max_date >= date_trunc('minute'::text, (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - p.acceptable_timedelta)))) THEN true ELSE false END AS is_current FROM (product p LEFT JOIN pf_date md ON ((md.product_id = p.id))) ORDER BY p.slug;

table.name: v_productfile
table.viewSql: SELECT p.id AS product_id, p.name AS product_name, p.slug AS product_slug, f.id, f.datetime, f.file, f.version FROM (productfile f LEFT JOIN v_product p ON ((p.id = f.product_id)));

table.name: v_watershed
table.viewSql: SELECT w.id, w.slug, w.name, w.geometry, COALESCE(ag.area_groups, '{}'::uuid[]) AS area_groups, f.symbol AS office_symbol FROM ((watershed w LEFT JOIN ( SELECT array_agg(area_group.id) AS area_groups, area_group.watershed_id FROM area_group GROUP BY area_group.watershed_id) ag ON ((ag.watershed_id = w.id))) LEFT JOIN office f ON ((w.office_id = f.id))) WHERE (NOT w.deleted);
